languages.text: 如果被{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人既受{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果影响，又受{g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}暴露弱点{/g}效果影响，则该敌人下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}损失3点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低10%。

traits.locale_text: アデプトが{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}と弱点の露呈の両方の影響下にある敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃{/g}すると必ずその敵は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を3失い、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}でダメージが20％減少する。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo afectado tanto por una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} como por {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Exponer debilidad{/g}, dicho enemigo pierde −3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} se reduce un −10 % en su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy that is affected by both an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, that enemy loses −3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −10% on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el adepto {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un enemigo afectado tanto por una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} como por Exponer debilidad, dicho enemigo pierde −3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y su daño se reduce un −20 % en su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, der mit {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} und {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Schwäche offenlegen{/g} belegt ist, verliert dieser Gegner −3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und sein {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird in seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} um −10 % reduziert.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy that is affected by both an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, that enemy loses −3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −10% on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
